channel.title: How do I change weilding emotes

item.title: How do I change weilding emotes
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

ok search in client.java for

public int GetWepAnim()

then, find then item Id you want to edit and change the return statement. Heres an example

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6541) // mouse toy { return 1540; }
so thats the wep anim, if you want to change how you look while walking with a certain wep then search this(belowe the last part)

public int GetRunAnim(int id)

and again find the wep you want to edit, and if its not there then add it, example

if(id == 6541) // mouse toy { return 1851; } that makes you fly while running with mouse toy lol…

Anyway, do this with public int GetWalkAnim(int id) and public int GetStandAnim(int id) and public int GetBlockAnim(int id)

Then you’ve changed the anim for a certain weapon while standing, walking, running, blocking, and attacking. Good luck!

Gahh you got it before I could post =/

Read full topic
